Welcome to flake_out's documentation!
=====================================

This package contains a geometric filter for classifying airborne particles (originally designed for snowflakes) in Terrestrial Laser Scanner (TLS) point clouds. Some example data, a demonstration script, and a tool for manually classifying TLS points are also provided. Full details of the filter can be found in Clemens-Sewall et al 2021.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
